ast.name: OpenBarcode 1.0.2
ast.comment:
OpenBarcode is a new generation of 2D Barcodes like Microsoft Tag and QR barcode just for TouchDevelop Platform.
if you want to have a OpenBarcode serial number you can send a email to kary@post.com and we will add your serial number into OpenBarcode.

If you want to make an OpenBarcode you should run "OpenBarcode Hub" from acctions and write "1" and then application will ask you the serial number you should write a serial with 6 numbers that this numbers should be 1 or 0 like this examples:
Now all you need is save your OpenBarcode in Picture Gallery
HOW TO READ IT

to read OpenBarcode you should run "OpenBarcode Hub" and write "2", now application will ask you a picture that you should choose from your gallery now choose your OpenBarcode, after this step application will write your OpenBarcodes serial number or open an URL for you.
CAUTION
You should know that you should just choose pictures to read that they made with OpenBarcode Maker, and OpenBarcode can't support other kinds of barcodes.
